If you enjoyed the Hour of Code, consider going beyond

Across all grade levels, find student-guided learning options and educational/curriculum resources for teachers. Our own Code Studio offers courses for elementary grades. Please, recruit more teachers to help expose the youngest students to computer science at an early age.

Want to get more involved in your country?

Join our international mailing list to be updated by our international partners, and find out how you can promote computer science education near you.
